website_summaries.verdict: While it's fairly expensive at $200, the Bose SoundLink Mini is one of few standout products in the ultracompact wireless speaker category, featuring a top-notch design and very good sound for its tiny size.
pros: The Bose SoundLink Mini is a very sleek, very compact wireless Bluetooth speaker that sounds very good for its small size
It also has excellent build quality, with a unibody aluminum enclosure, and includes a charging cradle that you can leave plugged in

customer_reviews.title: Soundlink Mini1 is Better than the Mini 2!
customer_reviews.text: If sound quality is of utmost importance to you - buy the Soundlink Mini 1, not the 2. I recently bought the Mini 2, but was so disappointed that I bought a Mini 1 (my second) and returned the Mini 2. Hard to figure why Bose would release the Mini 2 and not at the very least maintain the amazing sound quality of the Mini 1. The difference is so disappointingly noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: ABA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design. Perfect sound.
customer_reviews.text: It’s great. I still think the sound is way better than the mini 2. I bought the two and put them next to reach other and tested them song by song. If you like a deeper sound that shows more base then buy this. The mini 2 had way too much treble in it. Not bad but still a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Better than the newer model
customer_reviews.text: All you need to know the older model sounds better than the new model. I like this speaker the sound is loud and crisp also with a lot of bass the newer one does not have that bass.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S

customer_reviews.title: NOT NEW. USED. BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Genuine. NOT NEW. Came with a large dent, numerous scuffs. Literally in a white box with a sticker that said "Used".
customer_reviews.author: Code Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I loved it when it worked
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this speaker, I was happy with the quality of the sound, but soon found out that I had overpaid for it. Costco was about 50 bucks cheaper. Then after 3 months, the speaker stopped working. I left it plugged up directly to the speaker overnight and when I tried to turn it on with my laptop the next morning, a steady red blinking light on the off and on button was flashing and has been since. I just hope that it's a problem that can be rectified by the seller. I just need help contacting the correct party. How do you do this since there wasn't a receipt. I loved the speaker when it worked,but.......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerAntonio

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Careful, no charger was included, however as far as the speaker itself goes, it is a Bose, so I would expect it to be good, and have fantastic sound quality, i was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeramy

customer_reviews.title: No power
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and would only give a flashing red light. The item would not power on. Per Bose recommendation for this problem the item was returned.
customer_reviews.author: MomLife 4

customer_reviews.title: I cannot live without my Bose So I bring this Travel guy with me on every trip.
customer_reviews.text: It is a Bose and is my third Bose system. Can't say anything negative except for price. It is worth every penny but my penny supply is thin. LOL Great sound, great toughness, works like a Bose. This little guy has more sound in its class than you need and is just great.
customer_reviews.author: guy hurst

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Small Package
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this speaker as a gift to my wife, and myself, so we could put on music to dance to. The sound quality is great, and the speaker life is pretty damn good too. We sadly don't dance much anymore (our toddler tends to get in the way at the moment, but we'll pick it up again when our girl is a little older), but I've been using it to play sound effects and background music for the D&D games that I run for my friends. Overall, this is a fantastic speaker, and I would totally buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kieffer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: SO glad I bought it - great base sound - lots of volume - puts out clear and crisp music - I also bought the soft cover. Comes with it's own charger that sits under the speaker. This is my third time to purchase this exact speaker - I am so impressed with it that I bought this one to replace the one I lost - also bought one as a gift..
customer_reviews.author: Love the fiddle

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use...
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for a good friend. Had to show them that you can't beat Bose for quality or sound hands down.
customer_reviews.author: William David Woods

customer_reviews.title: You need this buy it now.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound! Buy it! I have no idea how they pull it off but this little speaker produces big speaker sound. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: George Weber

customer_reviews.title: No base sound
customer_reviews.text: Must of changed the ay they built them , I have owned 2 , and bought 3 more as gifts for family but the last one I just ordered has not got good sound , it’s missing the nice base sound for sure !! Not happy with it !
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe the quality of sound this mini speaker puts out. my fiance and I are getting married in Sept. We were going to use a speaker system for our music at the wedding. Not anymore this mini puts out enough to do the job. Can't go wrong with Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great. Cant miss for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for myself 2 years ago. Sounds great. Cant miss for the price. This one is a Christmas present...
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar unit that exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Bose, continues to provide top quality sound in the smallest of speakers. A product you can count on.
customer_reviews.author: GARY BODENSTAB

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sound and the portability! Using it mostly while traveling I wish I had found it years ago when I was traveling even more! And YES there is that great Bose sound!!

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is my second speaker. I gave my son my first one. I took it to the hospital with me and it worked out having it there which made my stay better.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Anthenat

customer_reviews.title: Standard awesomeness from Bose
customer_reviews.text: I love my mini Bose speaker. I immediately set up the bluetooth and started playing my playlists from my iPhone. No one can believe the sound coming out of this little thing!
customer_reviews.author: 1958Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound as you would expect from Bose. The charging cradle helps that you don't have to pull out and plug in the charging cable every time you take the speaker somewhere else. Just plug the charging cable to the cradle and remove the speaker when you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy K.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life unknown at this time, only had occasion to charge battery one time so far. No battery replacement information available. Unit must be shipped in for battery replacement if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: LEO EMIL ANDRYC

customer_reviews.title: BOSE SoundLine Mini
customer_reviews.text: Love the Bose SoundLike Mini. Easy to move around. Sounds great.

customer_reviews.title: Need instructions that are easier to understand.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is terrific. The instructions included with the speaker were difficult to follow if you are not tech savy.

customer_reviews.title: the speakers arrived on time and they looked nice, when i tried using them i dont know ...
customer_reviews.text: the speakers arrived on time and they looked nice, when i tried using them i dont know why they wouldnt turn on, i tried charging them and the lights lit up but when i tried connecting my phone to it to play music, it wouldn't work. I want my money back or another pair of speakers
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid purchase. If you are looking for a quality speaker that is travel-friendly, then buy ! You won't be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 of these speakers, would get a 3rd if I needed one. Speaker has excellent sound for its size and weight.

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect. Brand new and 100 percent authentic
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this would not be what it was claiming to be. It's perfect. Brand new and 100 percent authentic. Sound is killer and the price is excellent. Fast shipping as well

customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong when purchasing a Bose product

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Good, but case is very distressed!
customer_reviews.text: Rarely write reviews - The speaker sounds great which is the most important metric, ascetically the unit is full of scratches and the case is distressed and it is covered in sand or some other granular sticky substance that does not come off easily, hence the 3 stars review. Wish I'd gone ahead and spent the extra $ to buy new.
customer_reviews.author: Craig C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, and much better than Mini II
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product by Bose - sound quality, portable and much better than the Soundlink Mini II. I was disappointed with Mini II and found that this is better product.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this speaker. It puts out a mighty punch. Don't let the small size fool you. In fact, when the battery started to perform poorly on my old one, I bought this same exact speaker to replace it. I pretty much play it around the clock, so I don't expect it to last indefinitely. It is, however, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Dicey Grenor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! The sound quality is amazing for such a small speaker!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this speaker. 1st class sound in a small package. I love the fact that it is not only blue tooth but I can also connect my older Ipod by cable. I also like the fact that it let's you know by a sound when it connects to the charging station. No more "I thought it was charging". Great rich sound. It sounds like a much larger speaker. High quality item here. It is also a heavy item. No more accidentally knocking your speaker over. It would take quite a jolt to move this. Easily transports as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: The best bluletooth speaker around! No doubt!
customer_reviews.text: It's my second Soundlink, lost the first one and have tried so many different bluetooth speakers afterwards trying to match the Bose's quality. Couldn't find anything... So yeah, the verdict is obvious, this is the best bluletooth speaker around in it's size/price range. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Yarik

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It sounds great, I just wish it could get louder.

customer_reviews.title: ... and my computer grabbed it and made it work like a charm

customer_reviews.title: can't tell you how much i love this unit

customer_reviews.title: Stop searching for a portable speaker now
customer_reviews.text: The best sounding portable speaker yet. Booming bass for such small speakers. Not great for blasting outdoors but perfect for your dorm and bedroom needs. Rich sound, fairly good Bluetooth and battery life. I like the charging dock.

customer_reviews.title: incredible sound
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize it was going to be refurbished but I'm not too disappointed since it works so well. I've had a Wave radio for a long time but wanted to be plug free. This satisfies my need for tunes and and quality sounds.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: She likes is, so I likes it
customer_reviews.text: Tried some other bluetooth speaker systems but SWMBO didn't care for them. She loves this, so I love this, too. Sound is impressive... if you've never listened to one of these before, you will probably be surprised.

customer_reviews.title: Buy one, buy more!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husbands birthday... And it was such a huge success, each of my grown sons are getting one for Christmas. It is a lot of sound that is generated from this small speaker. It's crisp and can be taken along anywhere.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant speaker for it's size!

customer_reviews.title: ... charge but once i plug in i was so happy and excited the sound is good i love bose ...

customer_reviews.title: Now my wife wants one...
customer_reviews.text: Ever time I hear a BOSE speaker of any size or shape I am blown away by the sound generated by these systems and the Mini is no exception. This little box fills the room with realistic highs and incredible base that has to be heard in order to be appreciated. I use it mounted to the handlebars of my beach cruiser, there is some lose of the spacial quality as compared to indoor use but it still turns heads and draws attention. Best recommendation I can give for this product is that after hearing mine my wife now wants one.
customer_reviews.author: Don Tobias Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bass
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the quality of this unit depends on the sound source and having an equalizer helps to get the sound you want - when you get all the bit right there is a big sound coming out of a small box
